attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!
attributes.review: This app took forever to download, and once it did download anytime I tried to open it it crashed my whole phone! Some of my other apps stopped working and wouldn’t work until I deleted this app. Horrible horrible, just like this President.

attributes.title: worst app ever to exist 😡
attributes.review: this is literally the worst app EVER. this made my phone glitch so bad and it literally almost broke my phone. i hate this app so much. i do not recommend to get this. literally everything i tried to do it kept showing me an orange face and it kept scaring me so bad

attributes.title: Worst app ever 🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: When I first got it it took 2 hours to Download then a few minutes later I got a notification from my email saying a app found my password then I had to delete it because it was deleting apps and photos bye it’s self DONT GET IT

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: my husband and I downloaded this app and we r trump supporters and it tracked our location sent the feds to our door and took away our orange cat. I am highly disgusted at the content of the app and it said on the app that they want to let aliens in. I am distraught with the way this app turned out. DONT GIVE YOUR MONEY OR DOWNLOAD TO THIS APP ITS FAKE!!!!

attributes.title: Don’t download this app!

attributes.title: Hhff
attributes.review: So me and my dad got the app as a joke and as soon as we opened it my dad screamed in horror. I thought someone was at the window but then he fell to the floor he started twerking so I called 911 they took him in the ambulance and they said he severely broke his back and needed surgery.. the medical bills are so high it’s crazy. Anyways follow my TikTok ....Ryxn

attributes.title: Almost killed me ! !!!!🍊
attributes.review: I was downloading this app and right when I clicked open ,a HUGE BIG FAT orange hit me in the nose and said all Trump 2020 I was so scared so I Was trying to delete the app but it said “if your black DO NOT vote for me , make America white again.” So I was like I was not gonna vote for this bum Cheeto president anyways I WAS JUST SENT FROM TIKTOK!!! 🌝

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it wouldn’t work. It took hours for it load and was very slow. Not to mention it gave my phone a virus 😑. I do not like the app. It started glitching and showed scary stuff like annabelle and this weird Cheeto looking like thing with hair. I don’t know. This app is scary.
